scenario.title: Verify my local host API Call

steps.string: Given I have a Base URI <baseURI> for the REST API
And its base path is <BASE_PATH>
And its endpoint is <ENDPOINT>
When I send the <REQUEST_TYPE> request to RestAPI
Then the REST API should return me a valid response

scenario.title: Verify the REST response for a GET request returns all the mandatory fields

steps.string: Given I have a Base URI <baseURI> for the REST API

scenario.title: Verify the REST response after the POST request

examplesTable.tableAsString: | baseURI | BASE_PATH | ENDPOINT | REQUEST_TYPE|BODY| | http://localhost:9999/com.jaxrs.api| /webapi/hotels | /add|POST| {"hotelName": "Nirvana","location": "Kazhipattur","ratings": "5","landmark": " Opp to Victoria Towers","startedOn": " 19/09/2008","famousDish": "Appam"}|

Then the REST API should return me a valid response
